entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: A high-end broomstick model mentioned by Ron and Professor Flitwick.

entities.name: comet two sixty
entities.description: A broomstick model mentioned by Malfoy as being flashy but not as good as the Nimbus.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron is a student who is friends with Harry and has a Comet Two Sixty broomstick.

relationships.description: Ron compares the Nimbus to the Comet, saying that Comets are flashy but not as good.
Malfoy and Ron argue about their broomsticks.
Professor Flitwick is concerned that Potter and Malfoy are arguing.
Malfoy's actions indirectly help Potter get the Nimbus broomstick.
Professor McGonagall communicates with Professor Flitwick about the special circumstances of Potter getting the Nimbus broomstick.
